mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PHONENO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_ADDRNUM, MEMBER_GROUP, MEMBER_EAGREE, MEMBER_LAST_LOG, MEMBER_RIGHT, MEMBER_ENABLED ) VALUES ( #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_gender}, #{member_birth}, #{member_phoneno}, #{member_email}, #{member_address}, #{member_addrnum}, 'group', #{member_eagree}, sysdate, 'ROLE_USER', '1' )
